title: New Modern Luxury Private Honeymoon with Pool
summary:
From the team behind Makai Uluwatu, Makai Kedungu is a huge 1 bed, private pool luxury retreat strategically positioned to enjoy the best of ‚Äòold Bali‚Äô & the areas rugged beaches, whilst remaining a short 15 minute scoot into the madness (brilliance) of Canggu. 

Walk to the beach or scoot to local areas of Kedungu, Seseh, Pererenan and Canggu for a plethora of amazing cafes, restaurants, gyms, spas and bars.

Honeymoon package available for bookings of 1 week plus

The space
The best of all worlds üåç 

The villa‚Äôs modern industrial design was conceived with 2 things in mind:

1. Absolute comfort, always
2. Connection to the beautiful area

Not your average Bali Villa 

üå∏ Welcome Basket
üõå King Size King Koil Mattresses
üõú Up to 400MB Fibre WiFi
üèùÔ∏è Private pool with sun loungers 
üñ•Ô∏è Electric standing desk + office chair  
üì∫ 55‚Äô LG with AirPlay (Netflix & Apple TV)
üîä Sonos media system 
üë©‚Äçüç≥ NutriBullet pro 900w 
üçü Phillips Air Fryer 
‚òïÔ∏è Pod Coffee machine with milk steamer
üõÄ Freestanding Bathtub with caddy
üßπ Daily housekeeping 
üôÇ Dedicated Villa Manager
üõµ Private parking 
üõãÔ∏è Bianco oversized sofa
üåº Personalised toiletries 
üí¶ Shower Filters
üîê Smart lock entrance
üß° Heart shaped floating breakfast tray
üîå UK/USB/USB-C plug sockets 
üîã Phone battery pack 

The full sliding doors on the ground floor allow for true Bali style indoor/outdoor living whilst giving you the option to close up fully, cool down in the air-con, avoid those pesky tropical bugs whilst still getting the full experience thanks to the floor to ceiling glass

Deep and super comfy sunken lounge with over-sized western style corner sofa is where you‚Äôll settle in to watch movies on the brand new 55‚Äù LG smart TV

You can AirPlay your favourite music to the Sonos Move speaker, located in the kitchen

The fully equipped western style kitchen with Samsung fridge freezer, 3 burner hob, microwave oven, air-fryer, Nutri-Bullet Pro, pod coffee machine with milk steamer and rice cooker give you a true home from home experience

Downstairs is finished off with a couple of places that are super comfortable to work. You can sit either side of the huge island in one of the comfy stools (with backs) or, we have also provided a dedicated workspace complete with electronic stand up desk, desk chair and monitor

üå¥ Upstairs is all about the breeze and the trees 

Accessed by the beautiful black steel spiral staircase into the large bedroom space, the headboard cleverly houses the perfect dressing table area, along with full size bamboo mirror

A full wardrobe with ample space to hang your holiday clothing, also houses a safe to lock away your valuables, iron and hairdryer 

King Koil mattresses top the king sized beds, along with blackout curtains and blinds and super comfy pillows for a nights sleep you didn‚Äôt think existed in Bali

Full sliding doors lead out to the balcony with chairs and Terazzo table to enjoy your morning coffee, amongst the plants

The large and spacious (air conditioned) bathroom has both a shower and a beautiful freestanding bathtub (with caddy) and frosted glass for total privacy

Here you‚Äôll find Makai Shampoo, Conditioner, Body Wash, Body Lotion and Hand soap for your convenience

Villa 4 (of 4)

Guest access
Full, private access

Other things to note
Tampih/Kedungu is a slice of beautiful, old Bali. 

Please always greet the local people with a smile and warmth that they will give to you. 

You can walk to the beach within around 10 minutes and there are many cafes and restaurants within a 5 minute scooter ride. 

You can also walk to the wonderful Joshua District for great coffee and food options, Pigstone Taphouse and the stunning Bali Beach Glamping resort which is open for food and drinks as well as their spa.

Pantai Tampih is quite unique in Bali as a flat and tarmac area to run or ride a bicycle.

Included with your stay:

‚ù§Ô∏è Free welcome basket with milk, soft drinks & snacks
‚ù§Ô∏è Balian drinking water
‚ù§Ô∏è Luxury Toiletries
‚ù§Ô∏è Coffee machine & pods
‚ù§Ô∏è Villa staff with daily cleaning
‚ù§Ô∏è Bath & Pool towels for each guest
‚ù§Ô∏è Hi Speed Wi-Fi internet 
‚ù§Ô∏è Electric standing desk (with monitor on request)
‚ù§Ô∏è Safety boxes
‚ù§Ô∏è Concierge Services
‚ù§Ô∏è Laundry Service for towels and bedding

Available upon request through your Villa Manager:

‚úàÔ∏è Airport transfer
üöò Car rental (with/without driver)
üõµ Scooter rental
ü•ê Breakfast upon request
ü©µ Floating Breakfast
üå∫ Special occasion villa decoration
üíÜüèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è In Villa massage
üß∫ Laundry services 

Our local drivers Mr & Mrs Ulan also offer Bali tours for guests wanting to explore the beautiful island. These include:

üíö Ubud
ü©µ Nusa Dua
ü©∑ Uluwatu
üß° Begugul (North Bali)
ü©∂ Tabanan
üíú Singaraja

Services: Housekeeping available from 8:00‚ÄØAM to 1:00‚ÄØPM, 3 days a week

reviews.text:
Amazing, private villa. Housekeepers are really friendly and you get hotel-level service with daily cleaning and separately priced same-day laundry services but its very cheap. They contact you via Whatspp every morning if you need the service and they reply very quickly. I asked about amenities around the area and they gave a very detailed description which helped us to get around a lot more comfortably :) 
This could be my dream house! My partner and I were so well-rested and happy in the villa we barely went out üòÇ

We had an incredible stay here. We arrived quite late at night and were able to get in without any issues. The location was beautiful and very peaceful.
The villa was perfect for a relaxing getaway, sitting by the pool on the daybeds was a great way to spend the day.
The host and staff were very friendly. They looked after us with 5 star service everyday and always available to talk to/communicate with if need be.
We would absolutely recommend staying here if anyone is looking for a nice getaway!

The villa is amazingly beautiful and just like the pictures. It is clean and neat and just feels like home. Most importantly the host is so nice and highly responsive. The management team is always trying their best to accommodate us and to ensure we have what we need. We were impressed by their warm hospitality and proactive attitude. Overall, we enjoyed the stay so much and it made our first visit in Bali extremely memorable and enjoyable. Highly recommend it to anyone who is visiting Bali!

We cannot recommend this place enough! The villa was just as beautiful and magical as the pictures. Hayley and her team were incredible from the moment we booked our stay. Helping us book extra experiences and providing special treats in the kitchen upon our arrival. The space is beautifully decorated and impeccably clean. The workstation is perfect and the living room was adorable. We wish we could have stayed longer and can‚Äôt wait to come back!

My partner and I had a wonderful stay at this beautiful villa in Bali. It was spotless, well-maintained, and had everything we could possibly need for a comfortable and relaxing stay. The location was peaceful and felt like a true escape, yet still convenient enough to explore the area. The hosts were incredibly responsive and helpful throughout our stay, which made the experience even better. Highly recommend!

Villa was lovely and looked exactly like in the pictures. It is located in a private and quiet area, not far away from different beaches. There Are also some cute Caf√©s and Restaurants 2-3km away. 
We loved the time in the Villa and it felt really comfortable. The Daily cleaning was also amazing. They organized Scooter rental and laundry Service. üåûüíó

I loved staying at the villa! Located in Kedungu which is a very peaceful location surrounded by lots of nature, we were just a 10 min walk from the beach and getting around the area by motorbike was lots of fun.
The villa was very cosy and had everything you needed to stay in and chill, hosts were super friendly and helpful, we‚Äôll definitely be back!

This was hands down the best Airbnb I‚Äôve ever stayed in. The villa is spacious, beautiful, and incredibly well-maintained, but what really sets it apart is the team. The host and the staff on the property went above and beyond for every little detail. Thoughtful, helpful, and just genuinely amazing people. Can‚Äôt recommend this place enough!

The villa was everything we wished for a holiday trip. The interior of the villa was super clean, and the hosts went out of the way to ensure that we had a fuss-free holiday.
Will definitely recommend this place to anyone who wants to visit Bali and especially Kedungu.
10/10 experience with the Makai team :)

Had a fantastic stay - the villa is so beautiful and so well-equipped with toiletries, card games, and other little touches that make you feel immediately at home. The daily cleaning was also super helpful and gave us additional peace of mind. Will definitely be staying here again if we return to Bali!!

Amazing Villa. Amazing hosts. Spent way tooo little time there. The photos don‚Äôt do justice. Soo nice of a place that we decided to cancel our plans and hang out by the private pool all day. A couple of good restaurants around the place and just a stone throw away to the beach.

Great Villa, good spot to relax . Not much around , have a scooter or you will be ordering lots . Staff very nice owner very thoughtful .  Plan transport ahead of time for departure , a little harder to get grab cars to come pickup but delivery is easy

I had the most wonderful fabulous stay in my villa! The staff was always so helpful, responsive, and thorough! The entire team went above and beyond in making me feel comfortable , heard, and celebrated! 10/10 I DEFINITELY recommend!

I loved the place! The host and team were friendly, responsive and accommodating. The house is really cozy & charming, and I got to experience the countryside, the beach and the slow side of Bali. I would definitely stay here again!

Everything was perfect. The house was perfectly designed. The staff was very kind. They took care of us until we transferred from the airport to another place. And thanks for the gifts. I'm glad I chose it. I recommend it.

I had an amazing stay here. 
Very beautiful villa, with all equipment needed, feeling at home while having cleaning and assistance from the host if needed ! 
I definitely recommend!

Really beautiful villa. Some long distances to city and activities (around 1-2 hours driving) but perfect for a relaxing and private holiday. 
Incredibly good and available host!
The whole team were absolutely amazing. More than happy to help with questions I had and shared lots of recommendations. The villa was absolutely stunning üòç

highlights.description: This home is highly ranked based on ratings, reviews, and reliability.
